packages.description:
## Package Overview

This package provides a listener OAuth2 authentication provider, which can be used to authenticate the provided credentials against an introspection endpoint, and a client OAuth2 authentication provider, which can be used to authenticate against an external endpoint.

For information on the operations, which you can perform with this package, see the below **Functions**. For examples on the usage of the operations, see the following.
* [Secured Service with OAuth2 Example](https://ballerina.io/learn/by-example/secured-service-with-oauth2.html)
* [Secured Client with OAuth2 Client Credentials Grant Type](https://ballerina.io/learn/by-example/secured-client-with-oauth2-client-credentials-grant-type.html)
* [Secured Client with OAuth2 Password Grant Type](https://ballerina.io/learn/by-example/secured-client-with-oauth2-password-grant-type.html)
* [Secured Client with OAuth2 Direct Token Type](https://ballerina.io/learn/by-example/secured-client-with-oauth2-direct-token-type.html)

fields.description: Clock skew in seconds that can be used to avoid token validation failures due to clock synchronization problems

fields.description: A hint about the type of the token submitted for introspection

fields.description: Map of optional parameters used for the introspection endpoint

fields.description: Configurations for the cache used to store the OAuth2 token and other related information

fields.name: defaultTokenExpInSeconds
fields.description: Expiration time of the tokens if introspection response does not contain an `exp` field

fields.name: clientConfig
fields.description: HTTP client configurations which calls the introspection server

fields.name: active
fields.description: Boolean indicator of whether or not the presented token is currently active

fields.name: scope
fields.description: A JSON string containing a space-separated list of scopes associated with this token

fields.name: clientId
fields.description: Client identifier for the OAuth 2.0 client, which requested this token

fields.name: username
fields.description: Resource owner who authorized this token

fields.name: tokenType
fields.description: Type of the token

fields.name: exp
fields.description: Expiry time (seconds since the Epoch)

fields.name: iat
fields.description: Time when the token was issued originally (seconds since the Epoch)

fields.name: nbf
fields.description: Token is not to be used before this time (seconds since the Epoch)

fields.name: sub
fields.description: Subject of the token

fields.name: aud
fields.description: Intended audience of the token

fields.name: iss
fields.description: Issuer of the token

fields.name: jti
fields.description: String identifier for the token

fields.name: tokenUrl
fields.description: Token URL for the authorization endpoint

fields.name: username
fields.description: Username for the password grant authentication

fields.name: password
fields.description: Password for the password grant authentication

fields.description: Client ID for the password grant authentication

fields.name: clientSecret
fields.description: Client secret for the password grant authentication

fields.name: scopes
fields.description: Scope(s) of the access request

fields.name: refreshConfig

the password grant type.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Provides authentication based on the provided OAuth2 configurations.

returnParameters.description: Generated OAuth2 token or else an `oauth2:Error` if an error occurred

methods.name: generateToken
methods.description:
Get an OAuth2 access token from authorization server for the OAuth2 authentication.
```ballerina
    # string:oauth2:Error token = provider.generateToken();
    # ```

initMethod.name: init
initMethod.description: Provides authentication based on the provided OAuth2 configurations.

returnParameters.description: Generated OAuth2 token or else an `oauth2:Error` if an error occurred

otherMethods.name: generateToken
otherMethods.description:
Get an OAuth2 access token from authorization server for the OAuth2 authentication.
```ballerina
    # string:oauth2:Error token = provider.generateToken();
    # ```

classes.name: ClientOAuth2Provider
classes.description:
Represents the client OAuth2 provider, which generates OAuth2 tokens. This supports the client credentials grant type,
password grant type, and the direct token type, which sends the access token directly.

1. Client Credentials Grant Type
```ballerina
# oauth2:ClientOAuth2Provider provider = new({
#     tokenUrl: "https://localhost:9196/oauth2/token",
#     clientId: "3MVG9YDQS5WtC11paU2WcQjBB3L",
#     clientSecret: "9205371918321623741",
#     scopes: ["token-scope1", "token-scope2"]
# });
# ```

2. Password Grant Type
```ballerina
# oauth2:ClientOAuth2Provider provider = new({
#     tokenUrl: "https://localhost:9196/oauth2/token/authorize/header",
#     username: "johndoe",
#     password: "A3ddj3w",
#     clientId: "3MVG9YDQS5WtC11paU2WcQjBB3L",
#     clientSecret: "9205371918321623741",
#     scopes: ["token-scope1", "token-scope2"]
# });
# ```

3. Direct Token Type
```ballerina
# oauth2:ClientOAuth2Provider provider = new({
#     refreshUrl: "https://localhost:9196/oauth2/token/refresh",
#     refreshToken: "XlfBs91yquexJqDaKEMzVg==",
#     clientId: "3MVG9YDQS5WtC11paU2WcQjBB3L",
#     clientSecret: "9205371918321623741",
#     scopes: ["token-scope1", "token-scope2"]
# });
# ```

methods.name: init
methods.description: Provides authentication based on the provided introspection configurations.

parameters.name: optionalParams
parameters.description: Map of optional parameters use for the introspection endpoint

returnParameters.description: `oauth2:IntrospectionResponse` if authentication is successful, or else an `oauth2:Error` if an error occurred

methods.name: authorize
methods.description:
Authenticates the provider OAuth2 tokens against the introspection endpoint.
```ballerina
    # boolean|oauth2:Error result = provider.authenticate("<credential>");
    # ```

initMethod.name: init
initMethod.description: Provides authentication based on the provided introspection configurations.

parameters.name: optionalParams
parameters.description: Map of optional parameters use for the introspection endpoint

returnParameters.description: `oauth2:IntrospectionResponse` if authentication is successful, or else an `oauth2:Error` if an error occurred

otherMethods.name: authorize
otherMethods.description:
Authenticates the provider OAuth2 tokens against the introspection endpoint.
```ballerina
    # boolean|oauth2:Error result = provider.authenticate("<credential>");
    # ```

classes.name: ListenerOAuth2Provider

errors.name: Error
errors.description:
Represents the OAuth2 error type with details. This will be returned if an error occurred while listener OAuth2
provider try to authenticate the received credentials and client OAuth 2provider try to generate the token.

types.name: GrantConfig
types.description: Represents the grant type configurations supported for OAuth2.

packages.name: oauth2
packages.summary: This package provides a listener OAuth2 authentication provider, which can be used to authenticate the provided credentials against an introspection endpoint, and a client OAuth2 authentication provider, which can be used to authenticate against an external endpoint.
